extracted_playbook.title: Implement Data Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, segmented, and secure location (e.g., hard drive, storage device, the cloud).

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation and Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Segment the network and maintain offline backups of data to ensure limited interruption to the organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Regular Data Backup
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly back up data and password protect backup copies offline. Ensure copies of critical data are not accessible for modification or deletion from the system where the data resides.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Update Antivirus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install and regularly update antivirus software on all hosts and enable real-time detection.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Updates and Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Install updates/patch operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as updates/patches are released.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Audit Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Review domain controllers, servers, workstations, and active directories for new or unrecognized accounts. Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls with least privilege in mind.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports to reduce potential attack vectors.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Email Banner for External Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Consider adding an email banner to emails received from outside your organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Hyperlinks in Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Disable hyperlinks in received emails to prevent phishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multi-factor authentication to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Develop and Manage Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Use the National Institute for Standards and Technology’s (NIST’s) standards for developing and managing password policies.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Longer Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Use longer passwords consisting of at least 8 characters and no more than 64 characters in length.

extracted_playbook.title: Store Passwords in Hashed Format
extracted_playbook.description: Store passwords in hashed format using industry-recognized password managers.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Password User Salts
extracted_playbook.description: Add password user “salts” to shared login credentials.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Reusing Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid reusing passwords to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Account Lockouts
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multiple failed login attempt account lockouts.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Password Hints
extracted_playbook.description: Disable password “hints” to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Password Change Frequency
extracted_playbook.description: Refrain from requiring password changes more frequently than once per year.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Administrator Credentials for Software Installation
extracted_playbook.description: Require administrator credentials to install software.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Only use secure networks and avoid using public Wi-Fi networks. Consider installing and using a VPN.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct Cybersecurity Awareness and Training
extracted_playbook.description: Focus on cybersecurity awareness and training. Regularly provide users with training on information security principles and techniques as well as overall emerging cybersecurity risks and vulnerabilities (e.g., ransomware and phishing scams).
